item.title: Influx of college graduates could push bellwether central Pennsylvania county toward Harris
item.description: Centre County, which is home to about 160,000 people in the middle of Pennsylvania, could tilt this year’s closely fought presidential election.

item.title: Traders’ enthusiasm for stocks hits level seen just before 10% drop last year

item.description: Qualcomm shares fell in premarket trade after Bloomberg reported that British chip designer Arm is looking to scrap a key license for the U.S. firm.
